text: @fred_guttenberg @senatemajldr Its alright Fred the coronavirus is a Democratic hoax and the death toll numbers that is just for the fake Press, besides the President is not worried his only concern is getting reelected, besides either way Trump simply DOES NOT GIVE A DAMN about the health crisis.
